{"id":1758883301,"question_id":3886,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1756956963,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1758883301/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Number of Trapezoids I","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    const static int MOD = 1e9+7;\n    int countTrapezoids(vector<vector<int>>& points) {\n        // loop over all the valid y axes\n        // map -> y: int, x: vector<int>\n\n        unordered_map<int, vector<int>> m;\n        for (auto i : points) \n            m[i[1]].push_back(i[0]);\n        vector<int> ys;\n        for (auto [k, v] : m)\n            ys.push_back(k);\n        \n        int ans = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<(int)ys.size(); i++) {\n            for (int j=i+1; j<(int)ys.size(); j++) {\n                int l1 = (int)m[ys[i]].size();\n                int l2 = (int)m[ys[j]].size();\n\n                int cl1 = l1 * (l1-1) / 2;\n                int cl2 = l2 * (l2-1) / 2;\n                ans = (ans + (cl1 * cl2)) % MOD;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-number-of-trapezoids-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1186}
